column2: "I was considering the gifts I wish to give. A gift given without consulting the recipient's tastes is no gift at all, would you not agree?"
"I was considering the gifts I wish to give. A gift given without consulting the recipient's tastes is no gift at all, would you not agree?"
"If I am to truly exemplify the spirit of Santa, I must familiarize myself with the wishes of others."
"Therefore, I would like to learn what Christmas means to the people of ARKS."
"I see. By learning their tastes and desires, you hope to improve the chance that your gifts will be appreciated... Do I have it right?"
"I see. By learning their tastes and desires, you hope to improve the chance that your gifts will be appreciated... Do I have it right?"
"Guardian. Would you assist by gathering this information?"
